TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {6172=According to our research of North Carolina and other state lists there were 149 registered sex offenders living in Statesville, North Carolina as of July 30, 2015. The ratio of number of residents in Statesville to the number of sex offenders is 168 to 1.}
